类 ShellUtils

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  ShellUtils.CommandResult
      result of command ShellUtils.CommandResult.result means result of command, 0 means normal, else means error, same to excute in linux shell ShellUtils.CommandResult.successMsg means success message of command result ShellUtils.CommandResult.errorMsg means error message of command result

        execCommand(String[], boolean, boolean)

      • execCommand

        public static ShellUtils.CommandResult execCommand(java.lang.String[] commands,
                                   boolean isRoot,
                                   boolean isNeedResultMsg)
        execute shell commands
        参数:
        commands - command array
        isRoot - whether need to run with root
        isNeedResultMsg - whether need result msg
        返回:
        • if isNeedResultMsg is false, ShellUtils.CommandResult.successMsg is null and ShellUtils.CommandResult.errorMsg is null.
        • if ShellUtils.CommandResult.result is -1, there maybe some excepiton.
